content: कठिन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Hard, stiff; कठिनविषमामेकवेणीं सारयंतीं <ls>Me. 92</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 72</ls>; <ls>Mu. 2. 20</ls>; so °स्तनौ. {@--2@} Hardhearted, cruel, ruthless; न विदीर्ये कठिनाः खलु स्त्रियः <ls>Ku. 4. 5</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 64</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 6</ls>; so °हृदय. {@--3@} Inexorable’ inflexible. {@--4@} Sharp, violent, intense (as pain &c.); नितांतकठिनां रुजं मम न वेद सा मानसीं <ls>V. 2. 11.</ls> {@--5@} Giving pain. --नः A thicket. --ना {@--1@} A sweetmeat made with refined sugar. {@--2@} An earthen vessel for cooking; ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). --नी Chalk.
